name: A rat's bond
description:
First loved, then suddenly abandoned, a rat has to find its way home. But it is a long and tedious path, leading through many puzzles and dangerous obstacles. Pay close attention to your surroundings, and time your moves right to get through each of the different areas.“

“A Rat’s Bond” is a 2D puzzle adventure with frame by frame animated features. The story is strongly involved in the gameplay meaning that the player has a direct influence. The game follows Rico, a rat that has been living in the pipes of Quinn’s room. However one day Quinn’s mum catches Rico and throws the rat into the woods. Through various puzzles and obstacles the player has to find its way home back to their owner
